sets.description: When a target is shattered, grant **8%/10%/12%/14%** damage boost for **25** seconds. Only the highest level is applied when the effect is obtained repeatedly.

When there are more than 2 enemies around, hits restore HP equal to **14%/18%/22%/26%** of damage dealt upon attacking. The maximum HP restored every **0.5** seconds must not exceed **36%/42%/48%/54%** of ATK.
